074@Category(SmallTests.class)
075public class TestProtobufUtil {
076  @ClassRule
077  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
078    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestProtobufUtil.class);
079  private static final String TAG_STR = "tag-1";
080  private static final byte TAG_TYPE = (byte) 10;
081
082  public TestProtobufUtil() {
083  }
084
085  @Test
086  public void testException() throws IOException {
087    NameBytesPair.Builder builder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
088    final String omg = "OMG!!!";
089    builder.setName("java.io.IOException");
090    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
091    Throwable t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
092    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
093    builder.clear();
094    builder.setName("org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException");
095    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
096    t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
097    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Test basic Get conversions.
102   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Get} fails
103   */
104  @Test
105  public void testGet() throws IOException {
106    ClientProtos.Get.Builder getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder();
107    getBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
108    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
109    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
110    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
111    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
112    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
113
114    columnBuilder.clear();
115    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
116    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
117    getBuilder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(true);
118    ClientProtos.Get proto = getBuilder.build();
119    // default fields
120    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
121    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
122
123    // set the default value for equal comparison
124    getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder(proto);
125    getBuilder.setMaxVersions(1);
126    getBuilder.setCacheBlocks(true);
127    getBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
128    Get get = ProtobufUtil.toGet(proto);
129    assertEquals(getBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toGet(get));
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Test Delete Mutate conversions.
134   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Delete} or a
135   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
136   */
137  @Test
138  public void testDelete() throws IOException {
139    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
140    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
141    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.DELETE);
142    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
143    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
144    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
145    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
146    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
147    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION);
148    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111222);
149    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
150    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
151    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS);
152    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111333);
153    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
154    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
155
156    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
157    // default fields
158    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
159
160    // set the default value for equal comparison
161    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
162    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
163
164    Delete delete = ProtobufUtil.toDelete(proto);
165
166    // delete always have empty value,
167    // add empty value to the original mutate
168    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
169      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
170        qualifier.setValue(ByteString.EMPTY);
171      }
172    }
173    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete));
174  }
175
176  /**
177   * Test Put Mutate conversions.
178   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Put} or a
179   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
180   */
181  @Test
182  public void testPut() throws IOException {
183    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
184    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
185    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.PUT);
186    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
187    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
188    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
189    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
190    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
191    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
192    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
193    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
194    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
195    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(222222);
196    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
197    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
198
199    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
200    // default fields
201    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
202
203    // set the default value for equal comparison
204    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
205    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
206
207    Put put = ProtobufUtil.toPut(proto);
208
209    // put value always use the default timestamp if no
210    // value level timestamp specified,
211    // add the timestamp to the original mutate
212    long timestamp = put.getTimestamp();
213    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
214      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
215        if (!qualifier.hasTimestamp()) {
216          qualifier.setTimestamp(timestamp);
217        }
218      }
219    }
220    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, put));
221  }
222
223  /**
224   * Test basic Scan conversions.
225   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan} fails
226   */
227  @Test
228  public void testScan() throws IOException {
229    ClientProtos.Scan.Builder scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder();
230    scanBuilder.setStartRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row1"));
231    scanBuilder.setStopRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row2"));
232    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
233    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
234    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
235    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
236    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
237
238    columnBuilder.clear();
239    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
240    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
241
242    ClientProtos.Scan proto = scanBuilder.build();
243
244    // Verify default values
245    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
246    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
247
248    // Verify fields survive ClientProtos.Scan -> Scan -> ClientProtos.Scan
249    // conversion
250    scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder(proto);
251    scanBuilder.setMaxVersions(2);
252    scanBuilder.setCacheBlocks(false);
253    scanBuilder.setCaching(1024);
254    scanBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
255    scanBuilder.setIncludeStopRow(false);
256    ClientProtos.Scan expectedProto = scanBuilder.build();
257
258    ClientProtos.Scan actualProto = ProtobufUtil.toScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(expectedProto));
259    assertEquals(expectedProto, actualProto);
260  }
261
262  @Test
263  public void testToCell() {
264    KeyValue kv1 =
265      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("aaa"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
266    KeyValue kv2 =
267      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("bbb"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
268    KeyValue kv3 =
269      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("ccc"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
270    byte[] arr = new byte[kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength() + kv3.getLength()];
271    System.arraycopy(kv1.getBuffer(), kv1.getOffset(), arr, 0, kv1.getLength());
272    System.arraycopy(kv2.getBuffer(), kv2.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
273    System.arraycopy(kv3.getBuffer(), kv3.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength(),
274      kv3.getLength());
275    ByteBuffer dbb = ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(arr.length);
276    dbb.put(arr);
277    ByteBufferKeyValue offheapKV = new ByteBufferKeyValue(dbb, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
278    CellProtos.Cell cell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(offheapKV, false);
279    Cell newOffheapKV = ProtobufUtil
280      .toCell(ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY), cell, false);
281    assertTrue(CellComparatorImpl.COMPARATOR.compare(offheapKV, newOffheapKV) == 0);
282  }
283
284  /**
285   * Test Increment Mutate conversions.
286   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Increment} or
287   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
288   */
289  @Test
290  public void testIncrement() throws IOException {
291
292    MutationProto proto = getIncrementMutation(111111L);
293    // default fields
294    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
295
296    // set the default value for equal comparison
297    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
298    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
299
300    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(proto, null);
301    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(increment.getTimestamp());
302    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(increment.getTimeRange()));
303    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment));
304  }
305
306  private MutationProto getIncrementMutation(Long timestamp) {
307    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
308    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
309    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationProto.MutationType.INCREMENT);
310    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
311    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
312    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
313    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
314    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(11L)));
315
316    if (timestamp != null) {
317      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
318    }
319
320    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
321    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
322    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(22L)));
323    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
324    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
325
326    return mutateBuilder.build();
327  }
328
329  /**
330   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
331   * correctly.
332   */
333  @Test
334  public void testIncrementNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
335    MutationProto mutation = getIncrementMutation(null);
336    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(mutation, null);
337    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, increment.getTimestamp());
338    increment.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
339      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
340  }
341
342  /**
343   * Test Append Mutate conversions.
344   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Append} fails
345   */
346  @Test
347  public void testAppend() throws IOException {
348    MutationProto proto = getAppendMutation(111111L);
349    // default fields
350    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
351
352    // set the default value for equal comparison
353    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
354    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
355
356    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(proto, null);
357
358    // append always use the latest timestamp,
359    // reset the timestamp to the original mutate
360    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(append.getTimestamp());
361    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(append.getTimeRange()));
362    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND, append));
363  }
364
365  /**
366   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
367   * correctly.
368   */
369  @Test
370  public void testAppendNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
371    MutationProto mutation = getAppendMutation(null);
372    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(mutation, null);
373    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, append.getTimestamp());
374    append.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
375      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
376  }
377
378  private MutationProto getAppendMutation(Long timestamp) {
379    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
380    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
381    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.APPEND);
382    if (timestamp != null) {
383      mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
384    }
385    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
386    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
387    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
388    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
389    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
390    if (timestamp != null) {
391      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
392    }
393    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
394    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
395    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
396    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
397    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
398
399    return mutateBuilder.build();
400  }
401
402  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder createProcedureBuilder(long procId) {
403    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = ProcedureProtos.Procedure.newBuilder();
404    builder.setProcId(procId);
405    builder.setClassName("java.lang.Object");
406    builder.setSubmittedTime(0);
407    builder.setState(ProcedureProtos.ProcedureState.RUNNABLE);
408    builder.setLastUpdate(0);
409
410    return builder;
411  }
412
413  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure createProcedure(long procId) {
414    return createProcedureBuilder(procId).build();
415  }
416
417  private static LockServiceProtos.LockedResource createLockedResource(
418    LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType resourceType, String resourceName,
419    LockServiceProtos.LockType lockType, ProcedureProtos.Procedure exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure,
420    int sharedLockCount) {
421    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.Builder build = LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.newBuilder();
422    build.setResourceType(resourceType);
423    build.setResourceName(resourceName);
424    build.setLockType(lockType);
425    if (exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure != null) {
426      build.setExclusiveLockOwnerProcedure(exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure);
427    }
428    build.setSharedLockCount(sharedLockCount);
429
430    return build.build();
431  }
432
433  @Test
434  public void testProcedureInfo() {
435    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = createProcedureBuilder(1);
436    ByteString stateBytes = ByteString.copyFrom(new byte[] { 65 });
437    BytesValue state = BytesValue.newBuilder().setValue(stateBytes).build();
438    builder.addStateMessage(Any.pack(state));
439    ProcedureProtos.Procedure procedure = builder.build();
440
441    String procJson = ProtobufUtil.toProcedureJson(Lists.newArrayList(procedure));
442    assertEquals("[{" + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"1\","
443      + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\"," + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\","
444      + "\"stateMessage\":[{\"value\":\"QQ==\"}]" + "}]", procJson);
445  }
446
447  @Test
448  public void testServerLockInfo() {
449    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
450      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.SERVER, "server",
451        LockServiceProtos.LockType.SHARED, null, 2);
452
453    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
454    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"SERVER\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"server\","
455      + "\"lockType\":\"SHARED\"," + "\"sharedLockCount\":2" + "}]", lockJson);
456  }
457
458  @Test
459  public void testNamespaceLockInfo() {
460    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
461      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.NAMESPACE, "ns",
462        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(2), 0);
463
464    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
465    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"NAMESPACE\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"ns\","
466      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
467      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"2\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
468      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
469      lockJson);
470  }

475      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.TABLE, "table",

483  @Test
484  public void testRegionLockInfo() {
485    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
486      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.REGION, "region",
487        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(3), 0);
488
489    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
490    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"REGION\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"region\","
491      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
492      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"3\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
493      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
494      lockJson);
495  }
496
497  /**
498   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
499   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
500   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to true.
501   */
502  @Test
503  public void testCellConversionWithTags() {
504
505    Cell cell = getCellWithTags();
506    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
507    assertNotNull(protoCell);
508
509    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
510    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
511    assertEquals(1, decodedTags.size());
512    Tag decodedTag = decodedTags.get(0);
513    assertEquals(TAG_TYPE, decodedTag.getType());
514    assertEquals(TAG_STR, Tag.getValueAsString(decodedTag));
515  }
516
517  private Cell getCellWithTags() {
518    Tag tag = new ArrayBackedTag(TAG_TYPE, TAG_STR);
519    ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
520    cellBuilder.setRow(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
521    cellBuilder.setFamily(Bytes.toBytes("f1"));
522    cellBuilder.setQualifier(Bytes.toBytes("q1"));
523    cellBuilder.setValue(Bytes.toBytes("value1"));
524    cellBuilder.setType(Cell.Type.Delete);
525    cellBuilder.setTags(Collections.singletonList(tag));
526    return cellBuilder.build();
527  }
528
529  private ExtendedCell getCellFromProtoResult(CellProtos.Cell protoCell, boolean decodeTags) {
530    ExtendedCellBuilder decodedBuilder =
531      ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
532    return ProtobufUtil.toCell(decodedBuilder, protoCell, decodeTags);
533  }
534
535  /**
536   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
537   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
538   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to false.
539   */
540  @Test
541  public void testCellConversionWithoutTags() {
542    Cell cell = getCellWithTags();
543    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
544    assertNotNull(protoCell);
545
546    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
547    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
548    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
549  }
550
551  /**
552   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
553   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
554   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to false and decoding of tags is set to true.
555   */
556  @Test
557  public void testTagEncodeFalseDecodeTrue() {
558    Cell cell = getCellWithTags();
559    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
560    assertNotNull(protoCell);
561
562    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
563    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
564    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
565  }
566
567  /**
568   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
569   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
570   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to true and decoding of tags is set to false.
571   */
572  @Test
573  public void testTagEncodeTrueDecodeFalse() {
574    Cell cell = getCellWithTags();
575    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
576    assertNotNull(protoCell);
577
578    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
579    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
580    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
581  }
582
583  /**
584   * Used to confirm that we only consider truncatedMessage as EOF
585   */
586  @Test
587  public void testIsEOF() throws Exception {
588    for (Method method : InvalidProtocolBufferException.class.getDeclaredMethods()) {
589      if (
590        method.getParameterCount() == 0
591          && method.getReturnType() == InvalidProtocolBufferException.class
592      ) {
593        method.setAccessible(true);
594        InvalidProtocolBufferException e = (InvalidProtocolBufferException) method.invoke(null);
595        assertEquals(method.getName().equals("truncatedMessage"), ProtobufUtil.isEOF(e));
596      }
597    }
598  }
599
600  @Test
601  public void testSlowLogParamsMutationProto() {
602    MutationProto mutationProto =
603      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
604
605    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutationProto, false);
606
607    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
608      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
609  }
610
611  @Test
612  public void testSlowLogParamsMutateRequest() {
613    MutationProto mutationProto =
614      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
615    ClientProtos.MutateRequest mutateRequest =
616      ClientProtos.MutateRequest.newBuilder().setMutation(mutationProto)
617        .setRegion(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.newBuilder()
618          .setType(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME)
619          .setValue(ByteString.EMPTY).build())
620        .build();
621
622    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutateRequest, false);
623
624    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
625      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
626  }
627}
